#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t;
	long long int tl,tll,s,n,d,a;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    cin>>tl>>tll>>s;
	    n=2*s/(tl+tll);
	    cout<<n<<endl;
	    d=(tll-tl)/(n-5);
	    a=tl-2*d;
	    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	    {
	        cout<<a<< " ";
	        a=a+d;
	    }
	    
	}
	return 0;
}
